game.name: MY HERO : Before the Conquest
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, Steam Cloud, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: This is a turn-based card game. Build a powerful team, reasonably arrange your cards according to the environment, and fully utilize the equipment, potions, and scrolls you have obtained. Keep fighting until you reach the deepest part of the enemy's territory!
game.shortDescriptionEn: This is a turn-based card game. Build a powerful team, reasonably arrange your cards according to the environment, and fully utilize the equipment, potions, and scrolls you have obtained. Keep fighting until you reach the deepest part of the enemy's territory!
